name: los-pollos-assignment-1
description: Great news! We've just signed up a new client, Los Pollos Hermanos, and they want us to handle all of their deliveries across 14 different locations. But there's a catch: they use an ordering platform that we don't yet integrate with and they won't let us start service until we do. They've given us their login information and a URL to login at and are leaving the rest for us to figure out.
author: Melvin Canela
